xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
ring.title=Knowledge Ring Application ring.about=The Knowledge Ring Application allows to draw relations between wiki pages. For instance, the relation //has author// can be created to state that page //The Jungle Book// has relation //has author// with page //Rudyard Kipling//. Relations are stored in the wiki as any other page, with the only specificity that they have relation //is a// with the //Relation// page. The connections of each wiki page can be browsed using a widget showing up under each page title, allowing also to add new connections. ring.quick-links=Documentation and quick links ring.documentation=Documentation ring.demo=Demo ring.search=Search ring.administration=Administration ring.import=Import ring.types=Types ring.relations=Relations ring.filter=Filter
# RingClass Ring.Code.RingClass_has-referent=Has referent Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relation=Has relation Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relation_hint=Relation between this page and another page Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relatum=Has relatum Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relatum_hint=The relatum is the second part of the relation Ring.Code.RingClass_has-properties=Has properties Ring.Code.RingClass_has-properties_hint=Properties describing this ring
# StringRingClass Ring.Code.StringRingClass_has-referent=Has referent Ring.Code.StringRingClass_has-relation=Has relation Ring.Code.StringRingClass_has-relation_hint=Relation between this page and a value Ring.Code.StringRingClass_has-value=Has value Ring.Code.StringRingClass_has-value_value=Value taken Ring.Code.StringRingClass_has-properties=Has properties Ring.Code.StringRingClass_has-properties_hint=Properties describing this ring
# BooleanRingClass Ring.Code.BooleanRingClass_has-referent=Has referent Ring.Code.BooleanRingClass_has-relation=Has relation Ring.Code.BooleanRingClass_has-relation_hint=Relation between this page and a value Ring.Code.BooleanRingClass_has-value=Has value Ring.Code.BooleanRingClass_has-value_value=Value taken Ring.Code.BooleanRingClass_has-properties=Has properties Ring.Code.BooleanRingClass_has-properties_hint=Properties describing this ring
# ConfigurationClass ring.settings.title=Settings Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesIn=Included spaces Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesIn.hint=List of spaces where the application will be activated (separator: comma), e.g.: Main, XWiki Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesOut=Excluded spaces Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesOut.hint=List of spaces where the application will not be activated (separator: comma) Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_pagesOut=Excluded pages Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_pagesOut.hint=List of pages where the application will not be activated (separator: comma), e.g.: Main.WebHome, XWiki.WebHome Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_termSheet=Term sheet Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_termSheet.hint=Sheet to be used to display the pages containing at least one ring
